prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with sharp crystals and a fierce expression.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a giant snowball with icy spikes.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body and an intimidating icy glare.
Make a frosty creature that embodies the chill of winter with a powerful stance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a blue and white color scheme that has a unique ice crystal design.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a glacier come to life, with a menacing smile.
Show me a Pokemon with an icy exterior and a tough demeanor, ready for battle.

distinctive_features: Icy spikes on top of the head
